name: Balloon Boy (Jimanzium)
description:
Balloon boy is a happy little platformer about a boy with two legs and three balloons. Use this to travel through 6 different challenging levels.

Controls:

Run left/right: left/right arrow keys or A/D

Jump: Z

Balloons: X, this lets you fall slower and be blown around

Reset: R, can be used at any time

Retry: Z/Space

Back to menu: Escape

The game saves your current progress through a level when you press escape to go back to the menu, and when you reach another level. You can only skip to a level you have reached.
